nodes.text: Plop Dribble's was a spaceport restaurant at the Stobar spaceport.

Plop Dribble's was visited by Savage Opress on his search for his brother, Maul. During his visit, Opress assaulted one of the waitresses, Sassi, drawing the attention of local authorities. A chef working there, Loubo, attempted to intervene, but was stopped as Opress threw the waitress at him.

Soon after, Jedi Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan Ahsoka Tano visited the establishment and witnessed the aftermath of the events that had just transpired. Curious, the two wondered what happened. Loubo told them that these sort of things happen often, and that he would give them a free meal.
